name: Anvil Link
description: The player with the least amount of anvils dies every minute. There is a 5 minute grace period.

name: The Sky Is Anvils
description: Anvils fall from the sky.

name: Squad Health
description: You share health with your team. Healing and damage will apply to all team members. If one player dies, the team dies.

name: Unstackable Blocks
description: You can't stack blocks.

name: Inventory Swap
description: Everyone swaps their inventory, armor and XP when PvP is enabled.

name: The Sky Is Gravel
description: Anvils falls from the sky.

name: Haste Expedition
description: Every 5 minutes, you gain another level of Haste.

name: Agar.io
description: The lower your health is, the faster you run.

name: Angry Animals
description: Animals are hostile and deal 2 hearts of damage.

name: Angry Chicken
description: Chickens are hostile and deal 2 hearts of damage.

name: Anonymous
description: Your names and skins are hidden from other players.

name: Apple Link
description: The player with the least amount of apples dies every minute.

name: Diamond Link
description: The player with the fewest diamonds in their inventory dies every minute.

name: Backpacks
description: You have an extra inventory (/bp).

name: Barebones
description: The Nether is disabled All ores except iron/coal drop an iron ingot When a player dies, they drop 1 diamond 1 golden apple, 32 arrows, and 2 string. You are not able to craft enchantment tables, anvils or golden apples.

name: Barrage
description: When using a bow, a barrage of arrows will be shot.

name: Bats
description: Killing a bat has a 95% chance of droppping a golden apple, And a 5% chance of instantly killing you.

name: Battle Siren
description: Whenever a player starts fighting another player the coordinates of the fight will be shown in chat.

name: BedBomb
description: Beds explode in every world, including the overworld and the End.

name: Bench Blitz
description: You can only craft one crafting table.

name: BestPvE
description: Everyone starts on a list called bestpve list, if you take damage you are removed from the list. The only way to get back on the list is getting a kill, All players on the bestpve list gets 1 extra heart each 10 minutes.

name: Beta Zombies
description: Zombies drop feathers instead of rotten flesh.

name: Better NoClean
description: Whenever a player dies, the player with the most damage dealth in the last 30 seconds gets the kill. The killer then then receives 15 seconds of No-Clean and 15 seconds of loot protection.

name: Bleeding Sweets
description: Players drop 16 arrows, 1 string, 5 gold, and 1 diamond on death.

name: Blood Diamonds
description: Every time you mine a diamond ore you lose half a heart.

name: Blood Enchants
description: Every time you enchant an item you lose half a heart.

name: Border Link
description: A player that's furthest from 0,0 will die every minute.

name: #Bow
description: The only way to damage another player is with a bow.

name: Bow Fighters
description: Everybody will start off with an infinity book an arrow and two string. Your most powerful weapon can be a stone axe or wooden sword.

name: Big Crack
description: A big crack is created down the middle of the map (50 blocks wide).

name: Biome Paranoia
description: The color of your name in tab represents the biome you're in. To check the biomes, use /bl.

name: Birds
description: Every player has the ability to fly.

name: Bowless
description: Bows cannot be crafted or used.

name: Bread Link
description: the player with the least amount of bread In their inventory dies each minute.

name: Brimming Link
description: the player with the most items In their inventory dies each minute.

name: Buffing Randomizer
description: Every minute, a random item in your inventory gets enchanted.

name: Buildless
description: You cannot place anything except crafting tables.

name: Center Link
description: The player that is closest to the middle of the map dies every minute.

name: Chump Charity
description: Every minute, the player on the lowest health is healed.

name: Compensation
description: When a player on a team dies, the player's max health is divided up and added to the max health of the player's teammates. The extra health received will regenerate in 30 seconds.

name: Constant Dropper
description: Every 5 minutes, you are teleported 100 blocks above the surface.

name: Cupid
description: Shooting a player with a bow heals you by 1%.

name: CutClean
description: All food and ores drop smelted.

name: Damage Pocket
description: Every time you take damage, You lose a slot in your inventory.

name: Deadly Sun
description: The sun deals damage to you if you are exposed to it during the day.

name: Deadly Water
description: Touching water instantly kills you.

name: Death Acceleration
description: Your max hearts is dependent on how many players are in the game. Every time a player dies, everyone permanently loses a heart.

name: Depths
description: The lower you go, the more mobs damage you.

name: Diamondless
description: You cannot mine diamonds. Players drop 1 diamond when they die.

name: Disintegrating Miner
description: Every time you mine a block, you lose 1% health.

name: Dolphins
description: Whenever a player is in water, They will propel forwards and 'Dolphin dive' when sneaking.

name: Donators vs. Nons
description: Donators and non-donators are set on two teams to fight each other.

name: DoNotDisturb
description: Once you hit a player your fight cannot be interfered with Your tag lasts 30 seconds whenever you hit the player.

name: Double Health
description: Everyone has two rows of hearts.

name: Double Jump
description: You can jump a second time while in the air. Fall damage is disabled.

name: Efficiency Up
description: Every 100 blocks you break, your efficiency and unbreaking on all tools increases by one level.

name: Eggs
description: Throwing an egg spawns a random mob. Chickens have a 5% chance of dropping an egg.

name: Enchanted Death
description: Players drop an enchantment table if they are killed by another player. Enchantment tables cannot be crafted.

name: Enchanting Center
description: There is a single enchantment table at 0,0. You cannot place a block within 10 blocks of the enchantment table or craft them.

name: Ender Dragon Rush
description: The first player/team to kill the Ender Dragon wins! There is an ender portal at 0,0 that needs 3 eyes of enders to open.

name: Extreme Skyhigh
description: Every 30 seconds, if you are not above y:175, You will take 2 hearts of damage.

name: Fast Getaway
description: Killing a player gives you speed 2 for 30 seconds.

name: Fast Smelting
description: Furnaces smelt at a faster rate.

name: Fireless
description: You cannot take damage from fire.

name: Fish Link
description: The player with the least amount of fish (fish, salmon, pufferfish, clownfish, etc.) dies every minute.

name: Flower Power
description: Breaking a flower gives you a random amount of a random item in the game.

name: Fortune Up
description: Every 100 blocks you break, your fortune and unbreaking on all tools increases by one level.

name: Gapple Roulette
description: Whenever you eat a golden apple, you will get an additional random potion effect for  a small amount of time. The effect can be negative or positive.

name: Gap Zap
description: If you take damage while regenerating From a golden apple or golden head, The regeneration cancels.

name: Giga Drill
description: All tools are enchanted with efficiency X and unbreaking X.

name: Golden Retriever
description: When a player dies, they drop a golden head.

name: Goldless
description: You cannot mine gold. Players drop 4 gold when they die.

name: Gold Rush
description: You cannot craft any leather armor or iron armor. You can only craft either gold or diamond armor.

name: Grace Periodless
description: PvP enables at the start of the game.

name: Grave Robbers
description: When a player dies, their loot is put into a grave.

name: Gone Fishing
description: Players are given an OP fishing rod, 64 anvils, and 20k XP levels. Enchantment tables cannot be crafted.

name: Hastey Babies
description: All tools are enchanted with efficiency I and unbreaking I.

name: HasteyBoys
description: All tools are enchanted with efficiency III and unbreaking I.

name: Health Acceleration
description: Everyone starts with one heart. Every time a player dies, Everyone permanently gains a heart.

name: Highground Link
description: The player at the highest Y-level dies every minute.

name: Hostile Link
description: The player with the highest amount of kills dies every minute.

name: Hot Potato
description: When PvP is enabled, a random player will be given the hot potato. The player with the hot potato gets Speed II, and can hit another player to give it away. After 60 seconds, if the player with the hot potato is still alive they are instantly killed, and the cycle starts over again.

name: Butcher Link
description: The player with the least amount of mob kills dies every minute.

name: Infinite Allies
description: You can team with as many players as youâ€™d like, however in the end, only one player may win.

name: Infinite Enchanter
description: You are given 64 enchantment tables, 64 anvils, and 20k XP levels.

name: iPvP
description: PvP is off all game. The only way to damage opponents is indirectly; Things like lava, flint and steel, cacti are allowed.

name: Item Scrambler
description: Your inventory is randomized every 5 minutes.

name: Jump Expedition
description: Everyone gets Jump Boost and the level increases every 5 minutes.

name: Kings
description: Upon a team, 1 person will be King, the King will have: Strength, Resistance, Haste, and 20 hearts. If the king dies, the remaining teammates will receive: Weakness for 3 mins and Poison for 15 seconds.

name: Limitations
description: You can only mine 64 iron, 32 gold, and 16 diamonds. /mylimitations to check how many ores you've mined.

name: Lootcrates
description: Every 5 minutes, players are given a lootcrate with goodies inside.

name: LuckyLeaves
description: There is a 1% chance that a golden apple will drop from leaves.

name: Melee Fun
description: When you hit someone there is no hit delay (aka Combo).

name: Midas
description: The amount of hits you get on someone in a fight (melee or bow) is how much gold you get from killing them after the fight.

name: Moles
description: One person on each team is chosen to be the Mole. The Moles are one team and can communicate with each other trying to take out the other players. The normal players try to find out who the mole is on their team and kill them.

name: Mystery Scenario
description: Who knows?

name: Nine Slots
description: You only have access to your hotbar.

name: Naked and Afraid
description: You cannot wear or obtain armor.

name: Nicholas Cage
description: When a player dies, a sphere of TNT surrounds their death spot.

name: Nightmare Mode
description: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, Spiders, Endermen, and Witches are modified to be much stronger.

name: NoFall
description: You cannot take fall damage.

name: No Loot Swoop
description: When a player dies, their loot is only obtainable by the killer for 15 seconds.

name: NoClean
description: You receive 20 seconds of invincibility when killing a player. Hitting anyone during that time will remove your invincibility.

name: No Sneak
description: You cannot sneak.

name: Obsidian Link
description: The player with the least amount of obsidian dies every minute.

name: Lumberjack
description: You cannot craft swords.

name: Crafting Center
description: There is a single crafting table at 0,0. You cannot place a block within 10 blocks of the crafting table or craft them.

name: One Heal
description: You are given a golden hoe called "One Heal" and right clicking it heals you to full health.

name: Fragile Tools
description: Every tool has 1 durability.

name: OP Recoil
description: Every time you shoot an arrow you get pushed back. Players may shoot themselves backwards to boost Themselves faster than running speed. (Recoil but 10x stronger)

name: Ops vs The World
description: Staff vs. the players.

name: Paranoia
description: Doing certain things broadcasts your coordinates in chat. /paranoiainfo for a list of what does.

name: Passive Link
description: The player with the least amount of kills dies every minute.

name: Period of Resistance
description: Every 10 minutes, a new type of damage Will be selected that you are immune to.

name: Pink Horse
description: Every player is stuck on a pig the whole game. Pigs are invincible and players are not able to dismount.

name: Pocket Janitor
description: Your inventory is cleared every minute.

name: Popcorn
description: You are nudged in a random direction every second. Fall damage is disabled.

name: Portal Gun
description: Every player gets a Portal Gun. Shoot blue and orange portals and quickly teleport from place to place.  Left-click to change portal type. Right click to shoot a portal. Crouch and right click to remove a portal.

name: Potion Swap
description: Every 5 minutes you receive a different potion effect. - Speed I - Strength I - Haste I - Jump Boost I - Invisibility I - Resistance I - Fire Resistance I.

name: Prickly Combat
description: All armor pieces are enchanted with Thorns 10.

name: Progressive Speed
description: You start with speed 1, and each kill you get gives you 1 more level of speed.

name: Progressive Hearts
description: For every kill you get, you get an extra empty heart.

name: PvP Toggle
description: PvP toggles every minute.

name: Rag Dolls
description: All player start out with a knockback 2 and punch 2 book.

name: Raining TNT
description: TNT spawns within a 5 block radius of a player every second.

name: Recoil
description: Every time you shoot an arrow you get pushed back. Players may shoot themselves backwards to boost Themselves faster than running speed.

name: Red Arrows
description: When a player dies, a red arrow spawns above the surface To show where the death was.

name: Ring of Fire
description: When a player dies, a ring of fire surrounds their death spot.

name: Rodless
description: Rods cannot be crafted or used.

name: Sandbags
description: Shooting a block breaks it.

name: Scatter Swap
description: Players swap places every 5 minutes.

name: Select Fire
description: When you left click holding a bow, It cycles the mode to what the bow shoots. It can shoot creepers, TNT, flame arrows, or fireballs Chickens do not drop feathers Coal ore drops arrows with a 10% chance

name: Self Destruct
description: When a player dies, they instantly blow up.

name: Siphon
description: Whenever you get a kill, you will regenerate 2 hearts, gain 2 levels, and get a random tier 1 enchanted book.

name: Skydivers
description: Every time you take damage You get teleported extremely high in the air.  Make sure to have a water bucket in hand!

name: SkyHigh
description: Every 30 seconds, if you are not above y:101, you take half a heart of damage.

name: The Sky Is Lava
description: Lava falls from the sky.

name: Auction
description: 8 slave owners are chosen and they get 30 diamonds to bid on players as they choose. Any spare diamonds and given back to the owner in the actual game.

name: Slimy Crack
description: A big crack is created down the middle of the map (50 blocks wide). There is a layer of slime blocks at the bottom.

name: Snowball Fight
description: The only way to damage other players is by hitting them With snowballs. Snowballs deal half a heart of damage.

name: Speedy Miners
description: All players under y:32 receive speed 1.

name: Spells
description: Spells

name: Spicy Butterfingers
description: You drop your items every time you take damage.

name: Strongest Link
description: The player with the highest health dies every minute.

name: Sugar Rush
description: When the game starts you get 10 sugar named "Sugar Rush" and everytime you eat one you get 20 seconds of speed 5.

name: Superheroes
description: Everybody on a team will receive a superpower That will last for the entire game A player can receive 1 of the following:  Strength, Speed, Resistance, Double Health, Invisibility, or Jump Boost. Fall damage is off in this gamemode. For Health power: Gaps heal 3 hearts and Golden Heads heal 6 hearts. Does not apply to potions! (If teams of 5, Jump will be available, If teams of 6 or higher, Invisibility is available, unless the player is solo without a team.)

name: Super Smash Bros!
description: Each player on a team will receive a different class, All classes are chosen at random. The characters are Mario, Sonic, Kirby, Pit, Meta Knight, Donkey Kong, Pikachu, and Link. All the characters have different abilities.

name: Switcheroo
description: Shooting another player with an arrow switches your places.

name: TakeFive
description: Every time you kill someone you get to see their inventory and can take 5 (stacks) of items before it disappears.

name: Team Inventory
description: Every team shares an extra inventory (/ti).

name: World of Thieves
description: You have a 50% chance to disarm the player you hit with your fist

name: Timber
description: When you cut one part of a tree it cuts it all.

name: Timebomb
description: When a player dies, their loot is put into a chest The chest then blows up after 30 seconds.

name: Training Rabbits
description: You start with jump boost 2, and each kill you get gives you 1 more level of jump boost. Fall damage is disabled.

name: Triple Packed Ores
description: All ores drop 3 blocks of it's self. EXP Bottles are dropped Cows, chickens, pigs, skeletons, creepers and spiders drop 3x their loot. Sugar cane drops 3 bookshelves Leaves drop 3 apples.

name: Underground Link
description: The player at the lowest Y-level dies every minute.

name: Vegan Paranoia
description: 10 minutes after the game starts, any meat-dropping animal killed will have a 40% chance of messaging 1 alive person in the server the coordinates of the killed animal.

name: VeinMiner
description: When you mine an ore while shifting, The entire vein is instantly mined.

name: Villager Madness
description: All players start the game with 64 emerald blocks and 64 villager eggs.

name: Voidscape
description: All stone and bedrock is replaced with air.

name: Weakest Link
description: The player with the lowest health dies every 5 minutes.

name: Webcage
description: When a player dies, a sphere of cobwebs surrounds their death spot.

name: XP Link
description: The player with the least amount of XP dies every minute.

name: Zoomania
description: Every minute, a random mob will be spawned on each player.
